channel.title: Need Updaters on Character Selection After
channel.description: After u finish the accpet... so u can accept how do u make that look update to u. so then i look what i selected :confused:

item.title: Need Updaters on Character Selection After
item.dc:creator: @PIMP_JUICE PIMP JUICE
item.description:
@PIMP_JUICE wrote:

public void updateCharAppearance(int[] styles, int[] colors) {
for(int j = 0; j < 7; j++) {
if(styles[j] > 0) {
styles[j] += 0x100;
pCHead = styles[0];
pCBeard = styles[1];
pCTorso = styles[2];
pCArms = styles[3];
pCHands = styles[4];
pCLegs = styles[5];
pCFeet = styles[6];
}
}
for(int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
pColor = colors[i];
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Need Updaters on Character Selection After
